en: The proverbs of Solomon. A wise son maketh a glad father; But a foolish son is the heaviness of his mother.
hmr: Solomon Thuvarhai chu. Naupa var chun pa lâwm a siem a, Naupa invêt ruok chu nu ta dingin phurrik a nih.

en: Treasures of wickedness profit nothing; But righteousness delivereth from death.
hmr: Khawhlona rohai chu ienga khawm a hlâwk nawh a, Felna ruok chun thinaa inthawkin a san suok.

en: Jehovah will not suffer the soul of the righteous to famish; But he thrusteth away the desire of the wicked.
hmr: Mi fel hringna chu a ṭâm LALPA chun phal naw nih a, Mi khawhlo thilchâk chu a hnawt hmang.

en: He becometh poor that worketh with a slack hand; But the hand of the diligent maketh rich.
hmr: Kut zawia sinthaw chu a hung pase a, Kut taima ruok chun ama chu a sukhausa.

en: He that gathereth in summer is a wise son; But he that sleepeth in harvest is a son that causeth shame.
hmr: Nipui laia la khâwmtu chu naupa var a na, Busîk huna ininnghil ruok chu naupa, inzakna intluntu chu a nih.

en: Blessings are upon the head of the righteous; But violence covereth the mouth of the wicked.
hmr: Mi fel lu chunga chun malsâwmnahai a um a, Mi khawhlo bau ruok chu nunsietnain ân khum.

en: The memory of the righteous is blessed; But the name of the wicked shall rot.
hmr: Mi indik hriet zingna chu malsâwmin a um a, Mi khawhlo hming ruok chu thâm hmang a tih.

en: The wise in heart will receive commandments; But a prating fool shall fall.
hmr: Lungrila var chun thupêkhai pawm a ta, Hmûr khêlinhlip ruok chu sukhnuoi nîng a tih.

en: He that walketh uprightly walketh surely; But he that perverteth his ways shall be known.
hmr: Mi tluongtaka fe chu ngamtakin a feh a, A lampuihai pêtsantu ruok chu hriet nîng a tih.

en: He that winketh with the eye causeth sorrow; But a prating fool shall fall.
hmr: Mi a mit sêp sêp vêltu chun lungngaina ân tlungtir a, Hmûr khêlinhlip ruok chu sukhnuoi nîng a tih.

en: The mouth of the righteous is a fountain of life; But violence covereth the mouth of the wicked.
hmr: Mi fel bau chu hringna tuikhur a na, Mi khawhlo bau ruok chu nunsietnain ân khum.

en: Hatred stirreth up strifes; But love covereth all transgressions.
hmr: Theidana chun inkhingna a chawk suok a, Hmangaina ruok chun bawsietna po po ân khum hmang.

en: In the lips of him that hath discernment wisdom is found; But a rod is for the back of him that is void of understanding.
hmr: Hrietthiemna neitu hmûrhaia chun varna hmu a na, Hmawl ruok chu mi hrietthiemna boa um ruongzâng ta ding a nih.

en: Wise men lay up knowledge; But the mouth of the foolish is a present destruction.
hmr: Mi var chun hrietna a siekhâwl a, Mi invêt bau ruok chu sietna zing a nih.

en: The rich man’s wealth is his strong city: The destruction of the poor is their poverty.
hmr: Mi hausa hausakna chu a khawpui det a na, Mi pasie suksietna ruok chu an pasietna a nih.

en: The labor of the righteous tendeth to life; The increase of the wicked, to sin.
hmr: Mi fel sininrimna chun hringna ân tlun a, Mi khawhlo hlâwkna chun suolna.

en: He is in the way of life that heedeth correction; But he that forsaketh reproof erreth.
hmr: Sukdikna pawisatu chu hring- na lampuiah a um a nih, Kâwkna nghatsantu ruok chun a suksuol hlak.

en: He that hideth hatred is of lying lips; And he that uttereth a slander is a fool.
hmr: Hmûr khêlinhlipa theidana chu ip a; Demna thu sâksuoktu chu invêt a nih.

en: In the multitude of words there wanteth not transgression; But he that refraineth his lips doeth wisely.
hmr: Thu um khâwm ṭeu laia hin bawsietna a bo nawh a; A hmûr vêngṭhatu ruok chun vartakin a thaw a nih.

en: The tongue of the righteous is as choice silver: The heart of the wicked is little worth.
hmr: Mi fel lei chu tangka ditum ang a na, Mi khawhlo lungril chu man tlâwmte a nih.

en: The lips of the righteous feed many; But the foolish die for lack of understanding.
hmr: Mi fel hmûrhai chun mi tamtak a châwm a, Invêt ruok chu hrietthiemna tlasamin a thi.

en: The blessing of Jehovah, it maketh rich; And he addeth no sorrow therewith.
hmr: LALPA malsâwmna chun a siem hausa a, Chutaka chun lungngaina a belsa nawh.

en: It is as sport to a fool to do wickedness; And so is wisdom to a man of understanding.
hmr: Khawhlona thaw hi invêt ta ding chun ruolsiekna ang a na, Chuong ang bawk chun, hrietthiemna nei mi ta dingin varna chu a nih.

en: The fear of the wicked, it shall come upon him; And the desire of the righteous shall be granted.
hmr: Mi khawhlo ṭitna chu ama chung ngeiah hung tlung a ta, Mi fel ditna chu inhlawtlingtir nîng a tih.

en: When the whirlwind passeth, the wicked is no more; But the righteous is an everlasting foundation.
hmr: Thlivir chu a fe hmang el hlak angin, mi khawhlo chu a um ta nawh a, Nisienlakhawm, mi fel chu kumkhaw lungphûm ang a nih.

en: As vinegar to the teeth, and as smoke to the eyes, So is the sluggard to them that send him.
hmr: Uoin thûrin ha a sukṭim ang le, meikhuin mithai a sukthîp angin, Chuong ang chu a nih mi thabo chu a tirtuhai ta dingin.

en: The fear of Jehovah prolongeth days; But the years of the wicked shall be shortened.
hmr: LALPA ṭina chun nihai chu a suksei a, Mi khawhlo kumhai ruok chu suktâwi nîng a tih.

en: The hope of the righteous shall be gladness; But the expectation of the wicked shall perish.
hmr: Mi fel beiseina chu lâwmna nîng a ta, Mi khawhlo beiseina ruok chu bohmang a tih.

en: The way of Jehovah is a stronghold to the upright; But it is a destruction to the workers of iniquity.
hmr: LALPA lampui chu mi tluong ta ding chun kul nghettak a na, Suolna thawtuhai ta ding ruok chun bohmangna a nih.

en: The righteous shall never be removed; But the wicked shall not dwell in the land.
hmr: Mi fel chu sawn hmang ni ngai naw nih a, Mi khawhlo ruok chu hnuoia hin chêng naw nih.

en: The mouth of the righteous bringeth forth wisdom; But the perverse tongue shall be cut off.
hmr: Mi fel bau chun varna a phusuok a, Lei khêlinhlip ruok chu ât bawng nîng a tih.

en: The lips of the righteous know what is acceptable; But the mouth of the wicked speaketh perverseness.
hmr: Mi fel hmûrhai chun lâwm tlâkhai chu a hriet a, Mi khawhlo bau ruok chun khêlthu a sâk suok hlak.
